body: Like cursedhatter says there is already an English version which is pretty nice. There aren’t enough shota stories with smug/snarky girls with bratty/curious boys.
Already has a translation just check best in authors page
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
